message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $8200 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $9200 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I'm still interested in the product, but $9200 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8500?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $9000 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to try to save a bit more. Would you be willing to meet me at $8800?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more significant concession. I can do $9100 for the product, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9100 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8600?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $9100, Bob. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free accessory that normally costs $200. Would you be willing to meet me at $9100 for the product and the accessory?
I appreciate the extra accessory, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8400?
